title: Trump Prank

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record a trump/fart noise onto the switch.
• Have the switch user prank people by pressing the switch and making a trump noise.
• Prompt the switch user to press the switch again by making statements such as "I hope there’s no more of that!" or "Who did that come from?"

tooltipText: Prank people by making a fart noise with the switch!
